LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_ArmyCap.label: Army cap
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_ArmyCap.description: A soft field cap for servicemen when a combat helmet is not required.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_ArrayHelmet.label: Operator helmet
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_ArrayHelmet.description: A fully-covered helmet designed for field drone operators, features a built-in head-mounted display and neural-connected operating system. It can not only increase the control bandwidth, but also give full protection.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Beret.label: Beret
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Beret.description: Another altenrative for a military man's headwear when a combat helmet is not required.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_BionicSuit.label: Bionic Suit
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_BionicSuit.description: Physical enhancement equipment sewn from artificial muscle fibers. Can effectively increase the wearer's muscle strength and mobility.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_SoftKepi.label: Soft kepi
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_SoftKepi.description: Yet another soft cap headgear for a soldier when a combat helmet is not required. Stylish too.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_TacticalHelmet.label: Tactical helmet
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_TacticalHelmet.description: A lightweight combat helmet with a complex design, reinforced with plasteel. Not effective against blunt weapons.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_TacticalVest.label: Tactical vest
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_TacticalVest.description: A vest with armor plates inserted on the chest and back. While quite effective at deflecting gunshots and stabbing attacks against the chest, it does nothing to protect the limbs.
